title: Permabanned
body:
So i was permabanned on my account recently, and i obviously wish i wasn't, but i realized something after this permaban. I was under the impression that an account can be permabanned for stuff like racism, death threats, homophobic slurs, etc. But apparently you can get permabanned for calling your team "shit" or "retarded". I understand what i said is toxic, but i never go over the line in terms of what i say. Everyone gets frustrated at their teammates in any game, but i happen to voice my frustrations in chat in a toxic way. If there is a way to appeal my ban, i will try, but more importantly, i want to warn others than you CAN get permabanned for even the smallest forms of toxicity. If you got this far, thanks for hearing me out.

replies.body: Insulting other players will do it. Each punishment is escalating, so if you keep doing it, you'll get permabanned in time.

I did realize that after my 14 day ban that i should change my behavior, but i didn't realize i could get banned for saying what i said in the above chat logs, do you agree with my perma ban over those chat logs?

> [{quoted}](name=nonstopbeatsamw,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=eE3oOWPA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-02T01:53:06.410+0000)

What would much less than that entail?
You seem like the kind of guy who'd benefit from /mute all at the beginning of the match. Want to say something? Ping/emote it.
I did actually use /mute all before and after my 14 day suspension, but not every game...
Well I guess you know what you gotta do now
